attributes.action: gypsy and traveller sites need now! not in 2011.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As we know the government are trying to help get us more sites, 
But all local councils are looking at 2011 before they even start to identify where these sites will be.
This is not expectable as those youth that still live on the road side will then miss out on an education all together; these sites are needed now if we are to get all our youth into main stream education, or even to get traveller education to them.

Let’s start to stand up for our rights and get things moving.
